channel.title: REP ++ Moparscape Vet
channel.description:
This topic summarizes two main ideas. Before you automatically read the topic and go bananas, people care about reputation. You can post the fact that no one cares, and it's just a pointless number (which it is), but people do care about it. If we have the system already integrated with these forums, shouldn't we use this feature to the fullest abilities? Now my suggestion to the community is, let's try one last rep reset this time, I feel like most elitists are gone from this community, and if we enforced more rules about reputation it would be more regulated and worth while; give a small amount of reputation to all Moparscape Vets or the Staff and it shouldn't be abused.
If the reputation system gets cleaned, then shouldn't we bring back (fully) the Moparscape Vet awards and start actively handing them out again? Without a decent reputation system it's harder to decide whose worthy of this award which also makes sense to be another reason as why the award isn't given out anymore.
Discuss.
